column4: Hey guys. I was using some utilities to test my works security with wireless, but I have several "monitor" sessions open - or something? Ifconfig yields like 5 instances of "mon0, mon1, mon2" etc. How can I disable these?
killall mon0 && killall mon1 && killall mon2
they are not processes. They're my wifi device in monitor mode.
they are not processes. They're my wifi device in monitor mode.
